property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your ranged attack gets +4 damage. E Discard 1 card: Commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area. E Discard 1 momentum: Commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your ranged attacks get +2 damage for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next ranged attack this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Change the zone of this attack to any other zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your opponent has no committed foundations, commit 1 of their foundations. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Add this foundation to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Add 1 ranged card from your card pool to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your next ranged attack this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your ranged attack gets +3 damage. E Commit: Your ranged attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your ranged attack gets +1 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your next ranged attack this turn gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you have been dealt damage this turn, your opponent commits 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard 1 card from your card pool. Only playable once per turn. E Commit, discard 1 momentum: If this attack is blocked, it deals no damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this attack, (not as a block) you may not play attacks for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have discarded an attack from your card pool this turn, this attack gets +2 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with this card, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is discarded from your card pool during the Combat Phase, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: If you block this attack, add the card you blocked with to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 damage. Only playable if a card has been discarded from your card pool this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Earth} attack gets +2 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy, discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +6 damage and +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: If your {Fire} attack deals damage, add the top card of your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, it gets -3 damage (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, add the card you blocked with to your momentum. E Commit: This attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Discard 1 {Air} card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 2 cards: Your unblocked face up attacks get +3 damage for the rest of this turn. E: If your attack is partially blocked, your opponent destroys 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is partially blocked, your opponent commits 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, draw 1 card. E Commit 1 foundation: If your opponent has more vitality than you do, destroy 1 foundation that was committed due to this attack's stun ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Commit: Choose a block zone. If your opponent attempts to block this attack with a block of the chosen zone, their control check to play that block gets -3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After 1 or more cards are removed from your momentum during your opponent's turn, add the top card of your deck to your staging area face down. E Destroy 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. Your next control check to play a block this turn gets +X. X equals 3 minus the printed difficulty of the destroyed foundation (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack played as a reversal deals damage, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is added to your momentum this turn, add it face up. R Add this card to your hand: After your opponent plays an ability that grants a speed bonus, cancel its effects. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip, discard 1 momentum: Add 1 card from your opponent's discard pile to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +1 damage and +3 speed. E Commit: If there are 2 different attack zones in your card pool that do not match your attack's zone, discard 2 cards from your card pool and then draw 3 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your control checks get +1 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack has received a speed bonus this Enhance Step, change its zone to any other zone. E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, multiple abilities may not be played until the beginning of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: If there are 2 different attack zones in your card pool that do not match your attack's zone, add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals half the printed damage of the preceding attack in your card pool (rounded up). R Commit 1 foundation: After you block with an attack card, your opponent's next attack this turn gets -X damage. X equals half the printed damage of the blocked attack (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to your hand at the start of this turn's End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play this card, foundations may not be destroyed for the rest of this turn. Your opponent may lose 4 vitality to cancel this effect. R: After you block an attack with this card, during the next turn you may play 1 copy of this card in your discard pile once as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage. If it deals damage, the next attack this turn gets +1 or -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you check an attack, add it to your hand. Only playable once per turn. First E Add 1 foundation from your staging area to your card pool face down: Your non-throw attack with a damage of 4 or more gets +3 damage and 'Stun: 2'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the first foundation your opponent plays during their next turn is discarded. Only playable if your printed hand size is less than or equal to your opponent's.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Name a card. Copies of the named card may not be added to either player's momentum until the beginning of your next turn. E Discard 1 face down card from your card pool: This attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you check a foundation, re-check. (Only one re-check per control check) Only playable once per turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Discard all multiple copies from your card pool, then add the top card of your deck to your momentum for each card discarded in this way. R: After you check a 2 or less, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack may not be blocked by attack cards. E Commit 1 foundation: Draw 2 cards and then discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you check a 2 or less, that check gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Discard 1 momentum: For the rest of this turn, your attacks get +2 to the control checks to play them and +X damage. X equals the number of printed resource symbols that attack shares with your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After you lose vitality during your turn due to your opponent's attack or effect, gain that much vitality. R: After you block with this card, ignore progressive difficulty when playing blocks for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: The next time you attempt to play a non-attack card with a printed difficulty of 6 or less this turn, the control check to play it passes (no control check necessary). E Destroy: Change the zone of this attack to any other zone. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After an attack is discarded from your card pool during the Combat Phase, draw 1 card. E Destroy: You may use any ranged attack in your hand to attempt to block this attack as if it had a +0 mid block modifier.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Desperation E Commit: Choose 1 of your opponent's foundation. That foundation is considered to have a blank text box for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Discard 1 action card from your card pool. R Flip: After your attack's speed is reduced due to your opponent's effect, return it to its printed speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Flip: Name a card. Abilities printed on copies of the named card in card pools may not be played for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): Your attack gets +1 damage and 'Stun: 1'. Only playable if your attack's current damage is 4.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: If you have played at least 5 other enhance abilities printed on foundations this Enhance Step, add 1 non-unique foundation that you could normally play from your discard pile to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack with a ranged attack, that block gets 'Breaker: 1'. R: After your opponent's Ready Phase, ready 1 of your foundations with a printed blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Destroy: Both players discard 1 card. R Commit 1 foundation: After you play an attack, it gets +1 speed.
